Text: PS after Setup, go to Controll Panel and open Security Center, and disable option Windows Update and Automatic Updates! Never download any Windows Updates using a illegal windows copy, or your windows installation might stop working lol. Most people know this, in case you did not know ;)
Noobie help: after you rebooted computer with this CD in the drive, Format your C drive and install XP. and make sure you have all the drivers you need for your Video audio and internet! ;)
help met seeden als je download klaar is, laat de download staan en laat utorrent of bittorent aanstaan voor minimaal een paar uur... bedankt :)
